title: DOM build status + master DOM
description:
Summary of current state:
- Go project scaffolded with adapters for Hyperliquid (live WS) and Binance (WS+REST snapshot) plus mock adapters.
- Master DOM aggregates per-exchange books; snapshot-only sources (Hyperliquid) are diffed to compute deltas.
- Grouped DOM view supports runtime price banding (DOM_GROUP_STEP) and deltas per band.
- Fixed-point parsing revised to avoid rounding residue; price tick set via DOM_PRICE_TICK and default size tick DOM_SIZE_TICK=0.00001.
- Live correctness test (go test -tags=live ./internal/testutil -run TestLiveMasterDOM) verifies no negative sizes and runs against exchanges; EPS threshold optional.
Next steps:
- Add trade feed normalization (buy/sell volume per band) when ready.
- Consider per-exchange size ticks for exact precision.
- Implement Bybit/Coinbase adapters.
